Okay, the paranormalsystems.com box just sounds like crap. Perhaps it's the=
 small sound chamber. Maybe the cheap plastic case doesn't provide adequate=
 shielding, or all of the parts are from RadioShack. I don't know.

SOMETHI=
NG IS MISSING from that box, and I believe that it's not worth the requeste=
d price.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, November 14, 2007 9:56 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Oh Bruce...


  I just listened to the demo and it sound=
s like a hardware version of EVP maker. He can probably produce that unit f=
or less than 50 bucks. Even if I am wrong about the production cost and it =
turns out to be twice that he is still showing extraordinary greed with tho=
se price tags. This bothers me a lot! Talk about exploitation!

  Frank R.
=


  ----- Original Message ----
  From: psi_research <vilhellm@...=
t>
